text: walaqad baeathna fi kuli 'umat sbqat rasulana amrana lahum bieibadat allah wtaeth wahdah wtark eibadat ghyrh min alshayatin walawthan walamwat waghayr dhlk mimaa yatakhidh min dun allah wlyana, fakan minhum man hudana allh, fatabie almrslyn, waminhum almeand aldhy atabae sabil alghyi, fwjbt ealayh aldlalt, falam ywfqh allh. famshuu fi alard, wabsru baeynkm kayf kan mal hwla' almkdhbyn, wamadha hll bihim min dmar; ltetbruØŸ
